Content.Text: There's no room in my bag to cook now.
It tastes kinda funny, but oh well.

I can add a <RED>secret ingredient</RED> to this
<BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> recipe now!

I cooked for the first time! I earned the <RED>Amateur
Chef</RED> title! The quality of my dishes will go up
now.

I cooked <BLUE>10</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Fledgling Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>50</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Short-Order Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>100</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Buffet Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>200</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Seasoned Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>400</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Veteran Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>800</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Gourmet Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>1300</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Sous Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>1900</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Executive Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.

I cooked <BLUE>3000</BLUE> times! I earned the <RED>Master Chef</RED>
title! The quality of my dishes will go up now.
